title: *no broker fee* 2bd/1bath incl offstreet parking spot - Andrew Redline
posting_body: $2,800/mo 2bd/1bath w off street parking spot in Polish Triangle Andrew Square/red red line between South Boston and Dorchester.
The place: 950 sq feet 2 bedroom, one bath apartment with your own designated off street parking spot - not tandem! - and washer/dryer plus porch.
The apartment has a separate dining room, full eat-in kitchen, walk-in pantry, living room, and outdoor porch.
Private washer/dryer specifically for your unit in basement.
This is the third floor/top unit of a triple decker.

Situated in the Polish Triangle on Dorchester side of I-93, Andrew Station is barely a 10 minute walk away, JFK station is just over 10 minutes by foot, and the bars and restaurants on Dorchester Ave/Broadway are also a quick 15-min walk away.
South Bay Shopping Center is a five minute stroll away.
First and last month’s rent along with security deposit required upfront.
You are responsible for your own gas, electric, and WiFi.
When inquiring for tour, indicate your availability and whether it will be in person or via video chat (FaceTime or Zoom).
